title: BBC Click 2015 02 28 Boston Startups 480p WebRip x265 HEVC-AuP
description:
Read description before u download
else its not my fault
dont whine in the comments

Use torrent to download
webseed for fast download

Note : My first web capture
so much for missing the show one time

there were no sources available

Feedback welcome;
negative comments will be ignored

[img]http://i.imgur.com/02COqWA.jpg[/img]

I can't do this everytime as it is hectic for a non-UK resident

UK users , get HD 720p @ ~400MB if u can
Its easiest for u

let me know if u need help

watch on BBC Sat & Sun if you don't want to go through the pain

480p -> ~ 260 MB @ 1500 Kbps
Mp3 Stereo 128 Kbps
24 min duration
30 fps

here's wat I did ,for others to follow

Used TunnelBear UK VPN n BBC iplayer to download

(tried 1080p , filesize went to 8 GB..failed)

recaptured 480p screen
played n captured using Active Presenter : 340 MB Video
20 MB MP3 audio @ 128 Kbps

Converted only 480p video to 480p HEVC @ CRF 27 to reduce size retaining quality(believe me , both look same ;also my network is slow)
took 1 hr to encode
Resulted in 90 MB video

Converted XML Subs to SRT using Subtitle Edit
if u want to get HD, try 720p 420 MB @ 2800 Kbps

Muxed all, 

could n't remove DRM ,had to capture
if you know how to remove DRM ,feel free to PM n let me know 

I tried my max to retain quality

Thanks tofor the idea

Click -
The Boston Startups
Click steps outside of the gates of MIT into the city which is its host and finds out how much of the research inspired by the university is now entering the commercial space.

First shown: 1.30am 28 Feb 2015


Video: HVC1 830x468 30fps [V: 480p HEVC [eng] (hevc main, yuv420p, 830x468)
